1371.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|82|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|113|20$لَا|(do) not|75|99|30$يَرْجُونَ|expect|92|116|1912$لِقَآءَنَا|the meeting with Us|153|177|8026$وَرَضُواْ|and are pleased|125|137|5403$بِٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|with the life|99|107|7578$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world,|117|133|818$وَٱطْمَأَنُّواْ|and feel satisfied|133|149|8027$بِهَا|with it|62|78|1203$وَٱلَّذِينَ|and those -|98|114|42$هُمْ|they|50|66|49$عَنْ|(are) of|71|79|1105$ءَايَـٰتِنَا|Our Signs,|88|342|1344$غَـٰفِلُونَ|heedless.|90|344|6051$

1372.verse: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those -|82|90|51$مَأْوَٮٰهُمُ|their abode|95|112|8028$ٱلنَّارُ|(will be) the Fire,|134|151|762$بِمَا|for what|76|93|43$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|134|94$يَكْسِبُونَ|earn.|97|105|759$

1373.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|84|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|117|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believed|82|110|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and did|92|120|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|good deeds,|122|150|239$يَهْدِيهِمْ|(will) guide them|130|144|6845$رَبُّهُم|their Lord,|88|98|3627$بِإِيمَـٰنِهِمْ‌ۖ|by their faith.|111|132|8029$تَجْرِى|Will flow|81|102|242$مِن|from|50|71|53$تَحْتِهِمُ|underneath them|133|154|6399$ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ|the rivers,|88|109|244$فِى|in|48|58|89$جَنَّـٰتِ|Gardens|75|330|5122$ٱلنَّعِيمِ|(of) Delight.|100|355|5123$

1374.verse: دَعْوَٮٰهُمْ|Their prayer|100|118|6250$فِيهَا|therein|66|103|253$سُبْحَـٰنَكَ|(will be), "Glory be to You,|196|233|336$ٱللَّهُمَّ|O Allah!"|76|113|5366$وَتَحِيَّتُهُمْ|And their greeting|139|158|8030$فِيهَا|therein (will be),|129|135|253$سَلَـٰمٌ‌ۚ|"Peace."|75|88|5633$وَءَاخِرُ|And the last|101|114|8031$دَعْوَٮٰهُمْ|(of) their call|107|120|6250$أَنِ|(will be) [that]|118|131|4149$ٱلْحَمْدُ|"All the Praise be|132|138|5$لِلَّهِ|to Allah,|75|178|6$رَبِّ|Lord|59|265|7$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds."|129|232|8$

1375.verse: ۞ وَلَوْ|And if|99|109|179$يُعَجِّلُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah (was) to hasten|163|183|8032$لِلنَّاسِ|for the mankind|123|143|787$ٱلشَّرَّ|the evil,|74|94|8033$ٱسْتِعْجَالَهُم|(as) He hastens for them|187|197|8034$بِٱلْخَيْرِ|the good,|84|100|8035$لَقُضِىَ|surely, would have been decreed|239|271|5438$إِلَيْهِمْ|for them|76|108|3030$أَجَلُهُمْ‌ۖ|their term.|90|122|6367$فَنَذَرُ|But We leave|108|124|8036$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|100|20$لَا|(do) not|75|98|30$يَرْجُونَ|expect|92|115|1912$لِقَآءَنَا|the meeting with Us,|158|181|8026$فِى|in|48|71|89$طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ|their transgression,|148|160|127$يَعْمَهُونَ|wandering blindly.|138|138|128$

1376.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|93|96$مَسَّ|touches|73|90|3309$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ|the man|90|106|8037$ٱلضُّرُّ|the affliction|104|120|8038$دَعَانَا|he calls Us,|96|112|8039$لِجَنۢبِهِۦٓ|(lying) on his side|137|154|8040$أَوْ|or|41|49|154$قَاعِدًا|sitting|71|86|8041$أَوْ|or|41|71|154$قَآئِمًا|standing.|81|111|3016$فَلَمَّا|But when|82|112|141$كَشَفْنَا|We remove|94|124|6759$عَنْهُ|from him|76|106|3938$ضُرَّهُۥ|his affliction|100|115|8042$مَرَّ|he passes on|107|129|2318$كَأَن|as if he|69|113|4179$لَّمْ|(had) not|83|127|63$يَدْعُنَآ|called Us|79|123|8043$إِلَىٰ|for|53|97|118$ضُرٍّ|(the) affliction|116|138|8044$مَّسَّهُۥ‌ۚ|(that) touched him.|151|166|8045$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|106|702$زُيِّنَ|(it) is made fair seeming|180|210|1846$لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ|to the extravagant|146|176|8046$مَا|what|53|68|262$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|350|94$يَعْمَلُونَ|do.|92|325|912$

1377.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily|85|98|640$أَهْلَكْنَا|We destroyed|112|137|5422$ٱلْقُرُونَ|the generations|124|149|8047$مِن قَبْلِكُمْ|before you|107|132|192$لَمَّا|when|55|80|3471$ظَلَمُواْ‌ۙ|they wronged,|116|129|558$وَجَآءَتْهُمْ|and came to them|141|148|8048$رُسُلُهُم|their Messengers|132|146|6645$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear proofs,|136|150|880$وَمَا|but not|69|83|46$كَانُواْ|they were|87|101|94$لِيُؤْمِنُواْ‌ۚ|to believe.|91|98|5948$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|116|702$نَجْزِى|We recompense|125|202|5793$ٱلْقَوْمَ|the people|90|167|2316$ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ|(who are) criminals.|151|190|5641$

1371.verse: Indeed, those who do not expect the meeting with Us and are satisfied with the life of this world and feel secure therein and those who are heedless of Our signs

1372.verse: For those their refuge will be the Fire because of what they used to earn.

1373.verse: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - their Lord will guide them because of their faith. Beneath them rivers will flow in the Gardens of Pleasure

1374.verse: Their call therein will be, "Exalted are You, O Allah," and their greeting therein will be, "Peace." And the last of their call will be, "Praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds!"

1375.verse: And if Allah was to hasten for the people the evil [they invoke] as He hastens for them the good, their term would have been ended for them. But We leave the ones who do not expect the meeting with Us, in their transgression, wandering blindly

1376.verse: And when affliction touches man, he calls upon Us, whether lying on his side or sitting or standing; but when We remove from him his affliction, he continues [in disobedience] as if he had never called upon Us to [remove] an affliction that touched him. Thus is made pleasing to the transgressors that which they have been doing

1377.verse: And We had already destroyed generations before you when they wronged, and their messengers had come to them with clear proofs, but they were not to believe. Thus do We recompense the criminal people

1378.verse: Then We made you successors in the land after them so that We may observe how you will do.
